channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What to know ahead of Trump-Putin summit. And, Texas Democrats could end boycott
item.description: Trump and Putin meet in Alaska today. Here's what you need to know before the summit. And, Texas Democrats could end their boycott if California also ...

item.title: Trump and Putin meet in Anchorage today
item.description: President Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin meet in Anchorage today to talk about Ukraine. Here's what to know.

item.title: In Houston, some worry their problems would be neglected after redistricting
item.description: In one neighborhood of the city, Latinos worry about immigration and urban problems but may soon be grouped in with suburban voters.

item.title: As Republicans face voters during tense town halls, it's about sticking to the script
item.description: While just a fraction of Republicans in Congress are holding town halls during the August recess — in-person and virtual — the questions from voters, ...

item.title: Trump and Putin meet today in Anchorage. Here's what to know

item.title: California pushes left, Texas to the right, with US House control and Trump agenda in play
Global plastic talks collapse as countries remain deeply divided
item.description: The latest round of UN-led talks have ended in deadlock, with disputes over plastic production and recycling.

item.title: Have a CD account maturing right before interest rates are cut? Do this now.
item.description: Is the timing between your CD account maturity date and a rate cut set to collide? Consider taking these steps now.

item.title: Erin strengthens into hurricane, the first of 2025 Atlantic season
item.description: Erin is the first hurricane to develop over the Atlantic this year, and meteorologists are closely tracking its path and forecast.

item.title: Far-right Israeli minister taunts prominent Palestinian prisoner
item.description: Video shows Itamar Ben Gvir telling the most prominent Palestinian prisoner Marwan Barghouti "you will not win".

item.title: Inside Texas and California's showdown over redrawing of congressional maps
item.description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom announced a redistricting effort on Thursday to counter Republicans' attempt to reshape a series of Texas congressional d...

item.title: Unknown powder reported inside 26 Federal Plaza in NYC
item.description: The building at 26 Federal Plaza in Lower Manhattan was evacuated following reports of an unknown white powder.

item.title: Spain at 'extreme risk' of new wildfires as 14 blazes spread
item.description: Temperatures remain high across southern Europe with wildfires also affecting Portugal, Greece, France and the Balkans.

item.title: 'About our lives, but without our voice': Sidelined Ukrainians look on
item.description: Left uninvited to key talks, many Ukrainians look on with a mix of fatigue and mistrust.

item.title: Flash floods kill nearly 200 in Pakistan and Pakistan-administered Kashmir
item.description: The majority of deaths were recorded in Pakistan's mountainous Khyber Pakhtunkhwa area.

item.title: Washington sues to block Trump’s federal takeover of its police department as crackdown intensifies
item.description: Washington is seeking an emergency restraining order to block President Donald Trump’s takeover of its police department.

item.title: FluMist, a vaccine nasal spray, is now available for use at home

item.title: Critics say Trump’s push for fairness in college admissions is leaving out legacy preferences
